mapper.update: update t_scenic_ticket set ticket_cart = #{ticketCart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scenic_id = #{scenicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginacct = #{loginacct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid_time = #{validTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_money = #{orderMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, ticket_cart, scenic_id, id_card, phone_num, pay_status, pay_time, order_time, loginacct, order_id, valid_time, order_money from t_scenic_ticket where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
